item.title: At the zebra crossing on Southend Rd jct Park Rd and Foxgrove Rd, the new zebra crossing has still not been properly marked in white mastic paint, 8th October
item.description:
At the zebra crossing on Southend Rd jct Park Rd and Foxgrove Rd, the new zebra crossing has still not been properly marked in white mastic paint. The original substandard thin 'house paint' is half gone at this busy A road location. Seen 7/10/25
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glass in advert panel smashed, 8th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burnt Ash Road, Blackheath, London

item.title: Witnessed today Tuesday 7/10/25 between about 3.10 and 3.25pm illegal Worsley Bridge School patent driving onto the footway grass verge in Worsley Bridge Rd near the jct with Brackley Rd and parking on the zig-zag markings, 8th October
item.description:
Witnessed today Tuesday 7/10/25 between about 3.10 and 3.25pm illegal Worsley Bridge School patent driving onto the footway grass verge in Worsley Bridge Rd near the jct with Brackley Rd and parking on the zig-zag markings thus endangering other primary school children at the end of the school day using the zebra crossing and damaging the grass verge. Please install wooden bollards to stop recurrence and provide wardens and patent advice via the Head Teacher.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Worsley Bridge Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic Island Bollard, 8th October
item.description:
The traffic island bollard here has been hit and is coming away from its base.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Eden Park Road, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recently planted oak whip with tree stakes appears to have died (prematurely all brown leaves) fronting 28, Brackley Rd near the jct with Copers Cope Rd., 8th October
item.description:
Recently planted oak whip with tree stakes appears to have died (prematurely all brown leaves) fronting 28, Brackley Rd near the jct with Copers Cope Rd. This whip may be the replacement for the large mature street tree felled 3m away about a year ago. The label says 'please water me' but passing or neighbouring members of the public cannot be relied on to give the necessary regular watering in hot weather.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brackley Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On the railings by the Beckenham Jct Tramlink terminus buffers is cable-tied a vinyl advertisement banner for a music event 'Priory Live' in Orpington in mid August 2025., 8th October
item.description:
On the railings by the Beckenham Jct Tramlink terminus buffers is cable-tied a vinyl advertisement banner for a music event 'Priory Live' in Orpington in mid August 2025. Banner is about 1.25m x 0.75m. Becjenham Town Conservation Area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rectory Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: LED street lamp on in daylight at the jct of Court Downs Rd and Wickham Rd, Beckenham., 8th October
item.description:
LED street lamp on in daylight at the jct of Court Downs Rd and Wickham Rd, Beckenham. I'm doing this from memory but I think this is the lamp I noticed today.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Downs Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Planter on the left side of the entrance to Brondesbury Overground Station (Mildmay Line), Kilburn High Road., 8th October
item.description:
There is a dead pigeon inside the planter on the left side of the station entrance. It’s been there for a while and is visible to people walking by. It’s quite distressing to see, especially for children, and I’m concerned it may start to smell and attract pests if not removed soon.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Street cleaning - Dead animal on street

item.title: On the Rectory Rd street name plate uprights near the jct with Blakeney Rd, fronting Bouverie Lodge flats, are flyposted and cabletied two estate agent boards., 8th October
item.description:
On the Rectory Rd street name plate uprights near the jct with Blakeney Rd, fronting Bouverie Lodge flats, are flyposted and cabletied two estate agent boards. One is KFH, the other is 'Down' something, from memory. Please remove the boards completely to your storage premises, do not just cut them off and leave them on the footway as flytipping instead, as happened on previous occasions here and elsewhere.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blakeney Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The traffic signal at the jct of High St Beckenham with Kelsey Park Rd (by the flower garden) is angled away from properly facing north for southbound traffic, 8th October
item.description:
The traffic signal at the jct of High St Beckenham with Kelsey Park Rd (by the flower garden) is angled away from properly facing north for southbound traffic. It appears to be the Red, Amber and Green lamp cowlings facing down and off centre.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 102-104, High Street, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
